input_query:
You plan to visit 7 European cities for 20 days in total. You only take direct flights to commute between cities. You would like to visit Budapest for 5 days. From day 7 to day 11, there is a annual show you want to attend in Budapest. You want to spend 4 days in Brussels. You want to spend 3 days in Vienna. You want to spend 4 days in Berlin. You would like to meet your friends at Berlin between day 4 and day 7 to tour together. You plan to stay in Tallinn for 4 days. You plan to stay in Warsaw for 4 days. You have to attend a workshop in Warsaw between day 1 and day 4. You want to spend 2 days in Mykonos.

Here are the cities that have direct flights:
Warsaw and Tallinn, Mykonos and Vienna, Warsaw and Brussels, Warsaw and Vienna, Brussels and Tallinn, Warsaw and Budapest, Vienna and Brussels, Berlin and Brussels, Budapest and Brussels, Berlin and Budapest, Warsaw and Berlin, Berlin and Vienna, Berlin and Tallinn, Budapest and Vienna, Budapest and Mykonos.

Find a trip plan of visiting the cities for 20 days by taking direct flights to commute between them.

city_day_ranges.note: Meet friends (possible between day 4 and day 7, actually days 5-7 within stay)
Annual show from day 7-11, actually covered days 9-11
